description: This Python script downloads a PDF file containing Thai recipes, initializes an AI agent with a Gemini model, and interacts with the agent to summarize the PDF and request a recipe suggestion.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent that interacts with models and processes responses.

classes.name: File
classes.description: Represents a media file to be processed or analyzed.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A Google model used for processing and understanding media content.

methods.name: download_file
methods.description: Downloads a file from a URL to a specified local path.
